name: Diagonal Slash
description: An angled cutting attack from high to low. Versatile and harder to predict than horizontal slash.

windUp.description: Attacker positions weapon at shoulder height, preparing diagonal cut

committed.description: Weapon cutting on diagonal path, committed to the angle

recovery.description: Following through diagonal motion, returning to guard stance

variablePower.description: Can use 50% less (1 stamina) for weaker/slower attack, or 50% more (3 stamina) for stronger/faster attack

telegraphs.description: Weight shifts diagonally, stance adjusting for angled strike
Shoulders rotate on diagonal axis, weapon rising to shoulder height
Weapon positioned at angle, beginning diagonal descent
Full commitment, body weight behind diagonal cut

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death. Harder to predict direction than horizontal slash.
